lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And this week we had Vex, Laura, put up her playlist. Which is awesome. If you want to say something about your playlist and some cool stuff they can look forward to?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I hope you guys enjoy my soul. And also, song three, which is like... everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That one might have made me cry a little bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, just a little.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I may or may not have been thinking of the Critters while I was picking that song. Just so you guys know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited. I haven't heard yours yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are on. Hi. Welcome, Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're so early tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're the beginning of the announcements. It's great. We were talking about the playlists.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I've got to finish mine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Definitely go do it, because all that little extra content that we put out is always kind of a litmus test, to see if people are going to be interested in it. And if you guys go and actually visit the webpage at Geek & Sundry, then we get more content. So the more you go visit it--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make more stuff for you guys, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, the more that we can show the people upstairs that people do like our stuff and our content, the more you will get. So please go check it out if you have not yet. It helps.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's on you, CritRoleSource.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's on you, internet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's called Muzzled the Musical. Ashly Burch, a bunch of great talented people from The Lizzie Bennet Diaries and a bunch of other web series, Juliet Landau is in it. It's a great fun web series and it went live last week right before Halloween. So we have our three-episode arc up on YouTube. If you like musicals and you like fun silly dark, Doctor Horrible-style performances, then you're going to like this. Check it out, see if you like it. Let's see. Oh yeah, tomorrow is BlizzCon. BlizzCon, for all you crazy guys who are going or those who are watching on the digital online pass. A bunch of us Critters will be wandering the halls, doing panels and all kinds of fun stuff. Like, for me personally, I'll be there tomorrow at 4:30. I think, Liam, you are on that as well?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, same panel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be there doing that. And then doing a signing afterward. What else you guys got going on at BlizzCon?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't remember them now, so just go check my feed if you want. I'll see you there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: I'm going to have to do my job really quick and jump in on that. And say that tomorrow at 4:30PM PST here, we will be doing a live trailer watch and reveal with special guests. Laura and Travis are coming by. Alison Haislip and Ify Nwadiwe are going to be our hosts for that. And then we are going to have interviews with Duncan Jones the director and some of the cast and crew. It's going to be really cool, so tune in tomorrow, 4:30, for that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then if you're at BlizzCon, I think we're going to be wandering around a little bit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I'll be there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'll be there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll be there. Probably watching his panels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (voice cracking) We have quite a cavalcade of presents.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a lot of presents, you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Taliesin and I got here early and with Ryan we opened everything and it's an embarrassment of riches.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They had to open it so that we wouldn't be opening the boxes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We tried not to peek.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Some of the stuff I didn't see, some of the stuff Taliesin didn't see. So we're not completely spoiled, we're a little spoiled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got a little spoiled. I got a little spoiled early, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody sent a new Trinket! Look at that, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Giant bear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at him. He's so cute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And please. I mean, we thought it was a corpse, at first, when we got it. Then, when we opened it up we got really excited and I had this, which I used to open it. We got really excited and took a bear out, and then it was a bear and we forgot about all the wrappings and the paper. So if you sent us the bear, please contact us now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we don't know who sent it?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somebody is watching who knows that person, so just let us know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Find them, post it in the chat room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somewhere they're saying, "That's my bear".

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please! I have just been hugging it non-stop.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was pretty amazing when it was wrapped up. It looked like a body. Like, straight up, season two Dexter. It was pretty fantastic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which leads us to our next point. Please don't send us bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Please don't. No bodies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Address it to me, if you do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He'll know what to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think if it had been the only package, we would have been able to focus better, but there were about a hundred packages, so it was difficult for us to focus. We were opening stuff for an hour and a half, so thanks in advance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So thanks in advance for that. Also, you will recognize a couple of new songs tonight. We had the wonderful pleasure of having Bethesda approve us using Elder Scrolls music in our on-channel playlists. So I have been able to go back and re-incorporate all of my old Elder Scrolls music that I used when we originally played off stream. So that's really cool. Thank you, Bethesda. Thank you guys very much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now ten percent more realistic: Critical Role.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Exactly. Imagine that. Really stoked about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More authentic. Homebrew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just a reminder. The "How do you want to do this?" shirts are up. I still have to get one for myself. I think I should. And we have the Critical Role necklace and awesome keychain, which I have not seen in person until tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're really cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll pass them around and we can each give it our blessing. Each individual one is blessed by me. That's not true, but you will still roll well while wearing one. So that's exciting, and let's see what else we got. Do you want to do the quick Wyrmwood thing? Reminder from Wyrmwood?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We are friends with Wyrmwood Gaming, and you can still use the code CritRole to get free shipping on an order for your wood. Its beautiful wood. I have some black wood, but there's many different colors.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got this wood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are really, really beautiful. So just share the nerd connections, everybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pretty sexy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These are what's being done now, or are those for sale right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Kickstarter boxes are not. The CritRole code will not work for these, but they'll work for these bad mama-jamas right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which is really what you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And these, too. These are deck boxes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Thank you, Wyrmwood, for being so awesome and for putting that code together for our community.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have one personal thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a pilot on Amazon Prime called Everstar, where I play a little robot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And he's really uptight. Yeah, that's a pilot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, did the Amazon pilots launch today?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roger Craig Smith is playing Mouse Cookies. But if you like Everstar, which is this young action/adventure space-pirate story, give it a watch. If you like it, vote it through. If it gets voted through, I will continue to be a robot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I directed one, too, called Yoyotoki Happy Ears. So that's on there too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How's that go, again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yoyotoki Happy Ears. It's really weird and funny, and it's actually really awesome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also, Halo 5 is out this week, which Laura and I are in. It's amazing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not familiar with that. What is that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's some game. Takes place in outer space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that a match three? Like Bejeweled?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like Candy Crush, but with more death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's available on Android.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last announcement is that they announced that The Witcher is coming to theaters in a couple of years, and that has nothing to do with us, other than the fact that I'm probably going to be at full mast for the next week, thinking of that possibility.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Said so casually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so excited. Please don't fuck it up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They will. It'll be Mark Wahlberg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no, no!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Channing Tatum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Will Ferrell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will... I would not!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Channing Tatum is Geralt of Rivia.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Done! Let's make this happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't. Guys, I will stop this show. Your DM is out! If Channing Tatum becomes Geralt, I will be so furious. He's great at certain roles. I loved him in... I absolutely adored him in the 21 Jump Street movies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess he's not coming on our show, jeez.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's enough of our silly talk. Let's go ahead and dive into the chaos that is the current circumstance. Keep in mind, the culmination of leading into Halloween with this story arc and now going and starting a rebellion in Whitestone on the Fifth of November has been a very delightful, unintentional coordination here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I almost wore my special spider belt, too, but it felt too weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: During this process, you guys managed to sneak into the town, began setting out word of coming rebellion and that Percival de Rolo has returned and the Briarwoods' time is numbered. Upon meeting the previous chancellor to your father of the town, Archibald, you guys came to an understanding, and he was going to reach out to all of his contacts and let them know that the rebellion is happening. You guys then set out to set a two-pronged attack against two of the remaining new nobles in the town. Most of the party going to seek the outside of Count-- what's his name?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: Count Dooku.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Count Duke.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Duke Vedmeyer was the one that Scanlan went to, and then Tylieri is the one that the rest of you wandered outside. Now, as the rain pours down into the city, midday. Scanlan decided to open from a Polymorph spell, as a fly, to the top of the front doorstep of Vedmeyer's home. Then, proceeding to un-Polymorph and re-Polymorph into a triceratops. Of which, I have your statistics here for your triceratops form, if you want to come get that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go get them stats, boy!

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: (chanting) Stats, stats, stats!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that was where we left off, in the center of this chaos.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's do this!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So without further ado. Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I was just handed this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, take a look.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sucks to be first!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's got the maps out already. Get your shit together, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never been a triceratops before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not what I heard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, I need shelter. I don't know. How do triceratopses think?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably like punk rock hippopotamuses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hip-hop-ipotimi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Scanlan, you are-- I did not have a triceratops, but I did have a stegosaurus. It's the same size. I'm sorry, bloodspike behemoth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's kind of racist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry. You know what? They're not around to argue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That you know of.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are going to get a bunch of angry tweets from stegosauruses and triceratops.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sure. Please, bring them my way. As you slam your way into the front of Duke Vedmeyer's estate. Pieces of wood blasting outward, scattering among the center of the foyer. You see before you a rising staircase that divides into two separate staircases that curl around to the second level.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lovely decor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also notice that the entire interior is currently filled with guards. All seemingly prepared and almost expecting your arrival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I can take them, guys. I think I can take them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also see, at the top, Duke Vedmeyer himself. A large, hairless, grey-skinned goliath, wielding a giant two-handed sword, armored with a breastplate.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vecmeyer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vedmeyer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a goliath?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a goliath, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Vedmeyer is a goliath?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that's going to be fun later, but not right now. Okay, do I know? So, let's assess my knowledge real quick. I know about him a little bit. He is one of the thugs that came into the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He is not a magic-wielder, as far as I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know, no. And at first glance, based on the fact that he is wearing heavy breastplate and is wielding a giant two-handed sword, you get the feeling he is probably not as heavily inclined towards the arcane arts as others you have encountered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As I quickly survey the room, do I see anyone else who is a threat greater than a heavily armed guard? Anything that is a creepy wizard or a weird old mage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, no. Currently, all you see are a series of Whitestone guards in uniform armor, all with heavy crossbows, currently nocked. And as you come blasting through the door, they are already arranged in what appears to be a waiting pattern, should anything try and charge its way into the house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So they'll probably all shoot me, won't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In fact, roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So directly in front of me, there's a staircase going up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any other doors or exits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are doors on each side that are currently locked, and other than that, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are locked doors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are closed currently, and they appear to be-- There's a giant wooden beam crossed over the front of each. Then there's the outside which leads to the exterior, to the raining outside of the household, and the stairs that go up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll initiative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Initiative? Don't I get a surprise round? Doesn't matter. 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't get a surprise round because I sprung in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You made a very loud noise when you turned into a triceratops and tore through the front of the household. All right, so Scanlan is up first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So here's the thing. Here's the thing. I should probably leave.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But come on. I'm a triceratops! I've got to have some fun first, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can take a couple of hit points, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think you revert back to normal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does Polymorph carry over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you go to zero hit points in animal form, you go back to your regular full health and any damage that carries over just goes to your regular health, at that point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lot of people.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have 115 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys aren't there. Scanlan, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings Jurassic Park theme) (others join in)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, it's my turn first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have initiative, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I beat them with initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They are more than my charging distance as a triceratops, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's the only one that's within, technically. What's your speed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 40. You would get right up to Vedmeyer if you were to charge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would be dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you wouldn't. You got it. Go stick him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go-- How far away are the doors on the sides?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? It's about 35 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit, it could be trapped. Well, we'll find out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Expect the unexpected with Scanlan Shorthalt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes blasting through the doors.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to roll to blast through the doors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are going to find out. Yeah, go ahead and roll a strength check. Roll a d20 and add your strength modifier of the triceratops form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, strength modifier says plus five. So that's only a 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For a door!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me and doors don't get along too well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You, running, slam your head in, through, the horns protruding and tearing through the wood. The doors break inward, but the doors don't fully blast inward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The door beat me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is in bad shape. It won't take much more power to blast through.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These fucking doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now your worst nemesis.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So now I am stuck in a door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try and pull back out. You manage to pull out without an issue. The doors are mostly beaten inward. It will take but a small impact to blast through next turn, if you wanted to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Next turn? Do I still have an action after this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would have been your action.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're great! You're money. You're good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Every single one of those guys can attack you now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but it probably won't happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe they didn't see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Run away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not my turn anymore, right? That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My triceratops ass is sticking out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just right there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, they're all dummies. They're just mannequins.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This guy moves up over the railing with his heavy crossbow and aims this way. These guys all shift to this side with their crossbows.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here, this guy's going to move to this point so he can get a view of you. And Vedmeyer is going to move down here and get his sword ready, grinning. As he holds his sword up, he puts his hand up and goes, "Aim, fire!" A bunch of crossbow bolts get loosed at once (shh, shh) through the middle of the room. What's your armor class as the triceratops?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have no idea. 14?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11, that misses. That's a 13, misses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, these guys suck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are like stormtroopers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They are! You are being attacked by stormtroopers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 14, hits. 18, hits. 24, hits. That was six?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One more, that's a 22. So I have four that actually hit you with the crossbow bolts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're now a porcupine triceratops.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have 115 hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have 115 hit points?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And when those go out, you are back to human hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's eight piercing damage. 13 piercing damage. 21.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you immune to any kind of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. 34 points of piercing damage from this volley.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there resistance to anything on there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that take me down to? 81? Is that right? 115 minus 34, 81?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sounds about right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us back to the top of the initiative round, and you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, shit, then I've got to get some retribution.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Totally. Turn around and give it to them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I considered flanked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You do have a tail.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do have a tail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are like a drunk guy at a craps table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how to hit things. I've never hit things before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's the door you mangled in front of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to gore that guy to my left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is above you on the railing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a balcony. I thought that was a stairway down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry, this is a balcony up top. So he's actually aiming down and firing at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then just go through the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going through the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, then roll another strength check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, because I'm not tangling with Duke Vedmeyer or whatever. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23, not a problem. You burst through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going off the map.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, you guys!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's taking them off the grid.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: He doesn't have a social security number!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a ten-foot window across the way. It appears to be a normal dining room set.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that my action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's my movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I'd say at this point it is so damaged that it doesn't take much effort to push through, so you can manage to push through as part of your movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could pick 'em off as they run through. I'm not helping. I'm sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, you guys aren't there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not there. Shutting up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) I should get out of there. But it's so fun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do, Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, I am in the room. No one is in there with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So where's this laser pointer?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can also hold your action. Just as an option. Not to help, but you can hold your action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, yeah. I'll just position myself right next to the the door there, and I will hold my attack until anyone runs through the door. They get an insta-gore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. Holding an action. The next turn will be Vedmeyer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit, here he comes. Here he comes. It's me and the big guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's actually going to dash and just get up right next to where the doors are burst open. He can hear you right around the corner. The rest of these guys are going to dash in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god. I think I can take them, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There, there, there. This guy is going to just try and jump down. Let's see if he makes his acrobatics. He does not, with his armor. He leaps off the edge and manages to damage his ankle and is currently prone on the ground. That ends their turn. Back at the top. Are you still holding your action on your turn now? It's back to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Tell me this, did I hear a bunch of footsteps? Can I hear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You heard a bunch of footsteps coming in, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you set a blaze?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have any fire. I don't know why I was sent into this mission. I don't do fire things. I will drop my form. Is that an action?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have a lantern!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can drop it in a moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't you have a torch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to-- hold on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How did this plan happen, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because we're a bunch of slap-dicks, that's why!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why didn't you say I don't have fire?! I said, "Hey Scanlan, I should come with you," and you said, "I can take care of myself. How many times do I have to tell you guys? I don't need "your help."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The echoing voice you hear, in the back of your mind, as you imagine this is what Keyleth would be saying right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dorito's a failure, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay. I peek around the corner a little bit. Just make sure they're all there, and I will Stinking Cloud all of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why are you not Dimension Door-ing out of there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got to have some fun first. How often am I going to take on a whole house by myself?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like it. I'm so in love with you right now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I approve of this plan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see. They have to make a constitution save.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get the goliath. Get that goliath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the DC? Is this through your hand cone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, for sure it is. So 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's slowly moving away. Yeah, they are in a bad place right now. Okay, and you still have movement. You have only moved five feet so far.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Stinking Cloud methane-based?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) It is the way I do it. I can still move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you only moved five feet so far, so you still have 20 feet of movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll do a Dukes of Hazzard over the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unnecessarily.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I have to make an athletics check or anything for that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do an acrobatics to see how cool it was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See how cool it was!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Acrobatics?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I do for that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You got a number.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but I don't do these things. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. You (grunts) you slide, only because you partially destroyed it as a triceratops, (ssss) but in your head it looked pretty cool. Thank god none of your allies were around to actually witness it, but you heard the theme music.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, yes. So I'm near the window now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're right by the window.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, he is no longer affected by the Stinking Cloud. You can see as the cloud slowly moves past him, and his face comes through, his pupil-less, angry goliath eyes are staring at you from across the room to where the doors are open. You see him grit his teeth and (growls). You can hear his teeth scratching across themselves in anger and fury.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm shaking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of them are going to go. These two guys are going to move forward. They both come running in, putting another bolt into their crossbows, (clicking) pulling it back real fast, pulling up their heavy crossbows, and firing at you. That is going to be a 24.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that hits. Of course it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And an 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Against what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your AC!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 12 points of piercing damage from the first bolt and five points of piercing damage from the second. As both (zoomf, zoomf) bolts, one hits you in the shoulder and ricochets off, not doing much damage. The other one slams and actually embeds itself into your thigh, about an inch into it. It's piercing and sticking out the other side. Mostly caught armor, but you can feel it definitely got a chunk of flesh in the process.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends their turn. The rest of these guys, now, are going to try and make their saving throw. Fail. Fail. Fail. No, success on him, actually. He rolled a 19. A success on a natural 19. Fail. Fail. Well, no, actually these three succeed. The rest of them are still down. So I'll say that these guys here are all down. And he's still up. These two are still down. Okay. That ends their turn, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I so want to get some payback, but I shouldn't, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: G-T-F-O!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I can take these guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a hell of a Lightning Bolt line, right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How big is that diameter?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about six feet across.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I can't lift that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's a big, long table. You have a very wide line of individuals, right there. All ready to snatch you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, one more round. What do you say, guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: We're not here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One more round. I am going to-- fuck. Do I have line-of-sight on the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is right here. So you're by the window. So if you wanted to move over here, then you would have line of sight on pretty much everybody.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that would be so fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could move and then move back. I'm only helping with gameplay strategy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He could brain me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He could brain me in one shot. Okay. I will duck under the table so they think that's where I went, and then Dimension Door to the roof.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! You duck under the table. I'm going to say make a deception roll to try and successfully feint them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can they see the top of his head behind the table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Especially because there's a table and chairs up against it, and part of it has been crushed by a triceratops that was previously here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Oh, I'm going under the table."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sentences you never expect to hear in your D&D game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you grab your head. Oh no! Do a very elaborate dive under the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here I go under the table!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A little strange dull thud of arcane energy as you bamf up to the ceiling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He is reaching under the table, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, what does this mean? Oh, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, is that your turn? You are now up on the rooftop. There's rain pouring down. You are immediately soaked from the heavy storm that's now coming into Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. It's just me up here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just you up there, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I will go invisible and just hang and just see what happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Easy enough to do, because it will take a round for anyone to recover from that, anyway, because you have to use your action both turns. So as you are waiting up there, you cast Invisibility on yourself and wait.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I start digging through my pockets, if I have any flint or fire-making apparatus at all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Check your equipment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will. I will look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have an adventurer's kit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. I have some poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Poison the house. There you go. That'll work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are the best planners. Ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, you guys are rocking it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, I do have something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah? You do?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a Potion of Fire Breath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's raining up there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, but it's a potion. I don't know how it works!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're checking your pockets. You find the potion. You look down and you notice, even through the storm, you can see in the distance, there's the dark shape of a giant lumbering zombie guard making its way down to this part of the town. What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm on a roof that's all soaking wet, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no crawl space access? No attic I can get to?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Whoa, nothing. Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two? This is a pretty solid roof with apparently no entry point at any points. The craftsmanship is flawless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. You know what? I'll just try it. I will Fire Breath Potion myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you pull up (boink), pull the cork off, (glug glug).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what this thing does. I've just got this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you feel the fluid find its way down your esophagus, it warms it like a fine whiskey would, but the warmth just grows and grows to the point where it's almost too hot, but it never quite reaches a point where it's painful, but you feel as if this need to belch is burbling within your stomach, and at any given point in time, you could let that belch fly forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. And am I close to the entry point roof? The roof of the entry point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where you came in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I get over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way over to the top of the roof above.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so I'm just going to lean over the side and scorch the whole front entrance as much as I can from where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you (grunts) let the belch out, it comes out in a large spray of orange, yellow, and red flames that immediately burst beneath the overhang, which--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: By the way, I'm also invisible, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are no longer, unfortunately. When you do an attack of some kind, the invisibility is released. So this gnome appears, soaking wet, over the edge of the roof and then releases this gout of fire that blankets the front of the building, catching flames on all the portions of the front part of the second, and parts of the first story, including the top of the entryway that you had already smashed through as a triceratops, which exposed a lot of dried wood. It immediately bursts into flame. As you complete that breath and you inhale for a second, you hear voices now starting to shout from the inside of the house. (muffled shouting) You can't really make out the noises, but it sounds like there's panic now starting to hit from the inside, and you see a few guards start rushing out into the street to try and look at where the source of the flames came from. They both look up and see you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, great! Wait, these are guards who are outside, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These are guards who were inside the house that as soon as the fire came shooting down and burned the house, they rush out, look up, grab their crossbows, and aim them up towards you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just your hands and head are sticking over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 17?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 13.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doesn't he have at least half-cover from the roof?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 does not hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no, the 17 does-- well, it would have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So both go (pshew pshew), firing off into the rainstorm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I'm a gnome, do I always have half- cover? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. But it's easier for you to find it. It's a lot less to cover.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So both bolts (shoosh) streak past you into the sky. They angrily reach down and duck back inside the building with the rest of their movement to get out of the range of now what appears to be a flame-throwing gnome. So that's their go. What are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I know enough about this potion to know if it gives me any other breaths, or is that it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does progressively give you a breath for a short time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I can breathe again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that was the end of Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the giant! It's the undead giant!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have no idea what I'm doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're doing so well. It's so great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It lasts for an hour or until you exhale three times. It's a bonus action to do it, so you could also do something else and breathe fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a bonus action?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if that house is cooked enough, man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, maybe you should just keep burning it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah. So I'll run over to the back side of the house and do the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This side, because the angle the rain is coming at, is getting a little bit of water, but there is still a number of dry wood exposed by the immediate overhang that it does manage to catch, and the flames are beginning to burn up and collect on the sides because it is superheated flame. Both sides of the house now appear to be on fire. Looking over your shoulder, you can see now there is a pillar of black smoke rising up from the front of the building. You do see on the opposite side a hatch (click, bam) slam open and you see a giant, meaty goliath hand (boof)--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now stepping out into the rain, you see the goliath Duke Vedmeyer step up (doosh) with his two-handed sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. (shouting) Lovely home you've got here!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like Duel of the Fates. On a burning rooftop in the rain. (laughing) Giant goliath and a gnome who spits fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. How close is his hatch to the edge?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hatch is actually halfway. It's in the middle of the roof. It's actually met from the second story, from one of the rooms or one of the closets, so it's about 25 feet from either the front or the back side. It's right in the center of the house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (frantic breathing) Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatcha got, Scanlan? Whatcha got?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (muffled) I'm trying. I'm just seeing range here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It looks like a Frank Miller comic right now. It's what I see in my head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan showing down in the rain.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five times your Spellcasting ability modifier. My Spellcasting ability modifier is-- what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's charisma.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The roof is wet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The roof is indeed wet. I'm aware. (laughs) Oh, this will be interesting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) I want to fly away.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA, SAM
lines.text: (sing) Yeah, yeah, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the hand pulls back, comes rushing forward towards him, I want you to go ahead and make a strength check with the hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit, he's strong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The strength is plus eight, so add eight to this roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 plus eight...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to kill everyone in this motherfucking house! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've rolled so many ones today. This is ridiculous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have, and we're just getting started.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's full damage there. (mutters) Okay, he takes 34 points of falling damage and is knocked prone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't get this on network television, ladies and gentlemen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you're now standing alone on the rooftop, your Bigby Hand there next to you, a little trickle of fire curling at the corner of your mouth from your final dragon's breath when you decide to use it. What are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I've got to get out of here. (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just burn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Burn in the hatch and then get out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Am I close to the hatch?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're about 25 feet from it. It's where you got him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll hoof it over there and just look around and punch myself in the gut, (belch).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you reach over, you look down, and there is a ladder that leads up to the front, and there are two guards that are currently making their way up to the roof. They look up and see you, and their eyes go wide within their helmets, and as you release the flames, all you see is their faces go, "Ah!" Just engulfing the entire tunnel. Roll 4d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have any d6.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. They both fail their DC 13 dexterity saving throws because I can't roll tonight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Okay. They both take 15 points of fire damage and the entirety of that space has now burst into flames. You pull back because the heat is intense, backdraft-style, as you're at the top.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do my eyebrows burn off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They don't burn off, but you feel they might be a little singed. You'd have to give it a few days to recover. And you hear screaming down inside the tunnel and both of them are currently dealing with the fact that they're on fire. So that's your movement, that's your bonus action. You still have an action.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I've got to get the hell out of here, guys. Okay, tell me this, Dungeon Master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dimension Door. Can it be used at higher levels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me double-check on that, actually. I don't know if it can, but we'll find out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you Bigby's-Hand slam down onto the Count?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dimension Door, no. Dimension Door cannot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. How about Polymorph?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Polymorph... nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm fucked. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've used all your spell slots?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can use Bigby's Hand to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not like Feather Fall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can it carry you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you float?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe it's like a slide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe you can slide down Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fly it like the carpet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to try?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're welcome to try.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you've lifted people with it. You've grabbed people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, ultimately, on foot sucks for him right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just surf on the giant floating hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Through the sky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Through the sky.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is what your friends would say if they were there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All you've got to do is get away for this to be amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Otherwise, you'll burn alive on a roof.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All you have to do is live.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Comically tragic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Does Unseen Servant have any mass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not really, no. Unseen Servant is like a barely-there small-level air elemental.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. So I'm just going to (hums a bit, then sings) I'm jumping in the rain. I'm jump-- so I'm going to jump off the-- can I go away from the Goliath?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be this way, this way, or this way, because he fell off that side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So not the two sides that are on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flames are now licking up both sides of the house, so you have to go this way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where's the zombie stone giant now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to take a couple of turns to get over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the full length of it. At full dash it will get you there and there, and you still have about a good 20 more feet to get, so that's your turn, there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two guards that were back that way are now no longer on fire. They have gotten to the roof and put themselves out. They both look very, very angry at the current circumstance. They step out of the hatch both places.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Different hatch or the same hatch?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The hatch is on fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hatch is still on fire, there are still flames, but they got out (panting). They're out in the rain now. The rain's putting out and dousing the flame that's on them. They both look over and see you running away. They pull their hand crossbows at the ready. They were already ready to fire. That's a 24? And a 26.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For the second guy, I-- no, I'll just take it. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is seven points of piercing damage and 12 points of piercing damage. So 19 total.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. They both reach over and grab bolts out of their sides and start preparing for another series of shots. Both catch you in the side. One you can feel a few inches into your shoulder and it's making the joint stick, and the pain is starting to really burn on the left side of your body, but you're okay. Now it's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trust fall?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I trust fall off the back of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have the earring in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I do. (laughs) But I'm going to simultaneously make Bigby's Hand try to catch me at the bottom of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d20 and add your charisma modifier to it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Charisma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? You trust-fall off, your eyes somewhat closed and letting it happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, Bigby. Catch me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And in the moment that you expect ground to meet you with a heavy, hard smack of reality, a soft cushion of arcane energy catches you as these spiritual purplish fingers curl around and gently bring you to the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beymaxed it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Austin Powers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Is that my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that was just the fall, and you land there. He's way over this way. So you're outside of the house now. You're in a small alley between-- well, not an alley. You're on the side of the house and there's a big grassy area around it, and there's the fence that surrounds the whole...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Run, Forrest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm going to-- do I get an action? No, Bigby's is a bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an action to use its ability, so it was your action to catch you as part of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To do anything with Bigby's Hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It says, "and as a bonus action on subsequent turns."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it's a bonus action?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait. No, that's for moving it. The bonus action is moving it. I got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you've been moving it along with you as you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but the act of catching me was the action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're going to start running over this way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On my tiny little nubby legs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you plan to get over the gate?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm planning to climb over the gate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) I've got nothing left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics or acrobatics check to try and get over the gate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever the better number is. Whatever's better: athletics or acrobatics.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're both pretty terrible. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. Okay. Is that acrobatics or athletics?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's athletics.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Athletics. So you run, you jump up (ching), grab onto the metal bars to start just pulling yourself up over the top, land on your feet, and you're now right near where the street is, and you can see to your right it's open, towards the direction of where the rest of the party is. To the left, you can see now, coming through the rain about a hundred feet from you, a giant hulking zombie giant that's stomping towards you. As you notice that, you see a number of figures come swarming out of the two buildings to the side of it, and immediately start attacking the zombie giant.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM
lines.text: Go, go, get out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're attacking the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're attacking the zombie giant. That's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have inspired people. G-T-F-O, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm useless to you guys. Yeah, I'm going to go invisible and watch from the shadows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to tell from this distance which side is getting any ground, but it is currently held up by this group of about ten individuals that are attacking it at once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's so cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just going to stay there and wait it out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I'll wait it out if I'm in a relatively safe place, because I can't really do anything for you guys, anyway. You're on your own.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. We'll use that to hop over to the other party.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I'm taking a short rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good! Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A short rest is about half an hour to 40 minutes of waiting, so you might want to find a place that isn't quite so intense to do this. You can try and sneak into one of the nearby homes and do it, maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I still want to see where this giant thing goes, so I'm still watching it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you would not be able to rest, unfortunately. It's not a very restful situation right now, to gather yourself. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whew! I lived.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that Scanlan takes out an entire house, and we're all probably going to die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You were Scanlan Rambo.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a legend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have any red cloth you can tear off and tie around your forehead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is your beret still on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) I never got a beret. Did I get a beret?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You did get a beret. I thought you got a beret.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I wanted a beret.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I approve of this greatly. All righty. The rest of you guys who have all been slinking out the back. You just knocked a guard out. Trinket came with you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket went with Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog. Right, that's right!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do it, buddy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The back of the building. You can see what looks to be one door to a back room. Grog, as you come slamming up with Trinket behind you (thudding footsteps) up to the front of the building, you see the front doors are there before you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, they're in front of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm already raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just fucking bust through, apeshit-style.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make a strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I ask you, really fast?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I never leveled up Trinket's hit points when I leveled up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's important at this moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is very important at this moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ugh, why do you have to do that, man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket's hit points right now are what?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This Elder Scrolls music is pretty dope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bringing it home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket should have four more hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Zac, adjusting the microphones.

lines.name: ZAC
lines.text: Nobody knows. Nobody knew, until you said something!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got advantage on the strength check, so it was a 26.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The doors open. You can see now before you, there is a single staircase that curves up to a second floor. There is a large vase right at the base of it, right there. There's a couple of tables by it, and it goes to the right and left. Do you enter the premises, or are you staying right at the door? It's up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I go in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediately, you see the upper banister, right over the railing also, similar to what Scanlan encountered, has guards completely within this area, at the ready, crossbows pulled. In wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god. He just keeps adding them!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just 12 more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A voice behind them goes, "Loose!" (fshh)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At least Trinket's behind me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) What's your armor class?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to tell us when we can do something in the back, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. This is just-- because of the speed everything goes, he gets there before anybody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Just curious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries. All right, that is-- ooh. That is 27 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 15 to hit? No. Third one, that is 16 to hit? Nope. That is a 21 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 26 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 22 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All the shitty guards were over at the other house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then three more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Last one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And ten to hit. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT, TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll add them all up and then we'll halve that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus another nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 38, plus another 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 49, and then another 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 61. So you take half that, which would be 31 points of piercing damage on you in one volley of crossbow bolts at you. (shoosh) You protected Trinket, and the rage did descend it a little bit. The pain, as all these bolts are now sticking out of your chest. You look like this front-quilled porcupine. You just take the pain and grin for a second. You have that iron-y taste of blood reach the back of your throat from the immediate impact and it just further intensifies your rage. I'm going to have everyone here roll initiative because you're all acting simultaneously at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which dice? Green dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I'm like, "Which ones?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was-- nope. Not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. 25 to 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, should I roll for Trinket, too? Oh, he goes when I go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket goes when you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? All right. We have Vax at the top. 20 to 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks to the Feral Instinct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 15 to ten? Ten to five?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no. Sorry, you're not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I totally forgot. I'm so sorry. I'm at 26. I got distracted because I have a new--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Distracted by what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To be fair, I asked 25 to 20. (laughs) That's my own fault.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm using my new sheet and I'm just confused, so yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're cheating?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: New sheet. I leveled up, so I had to do a thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, guys, both Scanlan and Percy leveled up this last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's insane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. We have at the top of this combat round, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh boy. Okay, is there a way in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you getting a FaceTime?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Am I?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you FaceTiming somebody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd better not be. That was weird. I don't know what happened there. Anyway. Battle's still up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So is there a way in, at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a door right here at the back of the building that you can see, but the door is currently closed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm running over to the door and opening it. I can hear the commotion from inside, and I'm running in the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You rush to the door. You go to try it, (clicking). The door is locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold your turn, dude.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to hold your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding my action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I'm up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next up is Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to try to unlock the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You go ahead and you rush over (whoosh), pull out your lockpicks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's a ten. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rain's still pouring down, you have your hood up, the water's dripping past your face as you're trying to concentrate. You get the tools in. It's not a very complicated lock. (click, creak) You push it open, leading you guys into the interior of what looks like a kitchen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception check. Which is a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hasn't been in use for a while. The fire's up, there's a little bit of a slab in the corner where most of the preparations are done, there's a few cabinets that are up. It's dark. There's no lantern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And what are the other doors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no actual door there. It's just a walkway that leads into the next room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's open straight ahead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I haven't used any movement. If I go to the archway right across, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm clicking my boots as I walk forward. Do I perception check again at the arch, or does the same one hold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you glance through, you can see what appears to be...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I unlocked the door and I've walked ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There appears to be a hallway. There's a hallway that goes across the way. There's a door at the end of the hallway, and two doors to the right and left of this hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to go to that door and try the knob.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope, no, the other door in the room I'm in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, over here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go over there and you try it. (click) It opens up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Perception!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Opens up into what appears to be a storage room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Series of barrels, small grain sacks in the far corner. It appears that most of the dry storage for the kitchen is kept in this room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so I look straight at Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go straight through the hallway and try the door on the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Move you forward to do that, you move in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to use the last of my movement just to stay-- because I've got the boots on, I've got a lot of movement left; I can stay ten feet behind him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. Okay. You stay behind him as you move in. The door, this one here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, move the one to the right. Yeah, sure, that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (shhh) You slide that one open. It appears to be a bathtub in there. It's a rather nice powder room and bathroom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no way to just quickly push the other door open, too, is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try. I'll say for this round, you can go ahead and open that, look inside for a second, go for this, just really quick checking back and forth. This one, this door actually, it does not appear to open at a push.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I signal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I, at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you've already done your move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we're on the first floor, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you guys are on the base floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And they're all up on the second floor, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, that's your go. So. Bringing us to Count Tylieri's turn. Count Tylieri, who is currently looking over the banister. He kind of steps forward here for a second. Grog, this works for you because you look up and see all the guards there. Tylieri walks up. This rotund-looking, slimy individual, thinning hair, very pale skin, a little bit of facial hair that has never really seemed to grow fully in, but he tries to groom the best he can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog's beard is better than that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's got rings encrusting his fingers, but he walks with a deftness to the edge of this stairway and looks over and says, "Interesting. I figured "there'd be more of you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Interesting. There's a lot of dead men up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Of which, you see him leap up onto the ceiling, (pshh) stick to it. And begin to (skittering noise) scatter across.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one with the shitty beard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tylieri?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's Spider-man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He jumps up and spider-crawls across the ceiling, and then drops down. Yeah. With deft acrobatic feats, he leaps across, drops and lands right in front of you. You can see now in his face, as slovenly as it is, there is a look of deathly hunger in his eyes, and fangs bared from under his lips.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a neat trick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is now going to make two melee attacks against you. That's a natural 20 with the claw, and the other one's going to be a 15? I don't think it's going to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one (whoosh). It catches you off guard from the sheer weird assault that he's brought to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's wrong with you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You take 16 points of slashing damage (whoosh) from the first arc, and he goes up with the second hand and this time you (grunt) pull out of the way. His hand manages to knock some of the bolts free that were jammed in your chest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Half the 16, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half of 16, correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So, eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's his go. And he just grins at you with this hissing sound, licking his fanged lips. That ends his turn. That brings us to Grog. You're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. War hammer (fwoosh) bursts into flames. Your eyes all of a sudden go into an intense glare as you rear up and go into your frenzied rage. Make your attacks. Do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 24?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits on the first strike. You only have advantage on the first attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, gotcha. Okay. Just the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the first one's a reckless strike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 21?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All three hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's with the minus five, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Great weapon master?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because of great weapon master, it would be minus five to each attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the last one was 15?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last one misses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the first two do hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I forgot that part. Know your rules, kids.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then you add a ten to all of them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 20 for the second one, and the third one misses, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's with the fire, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's with the fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Third one misses, so 41 points of damage to him with the first two, (whack, whack), the impacts slamming into him. You can see his body get pushed back with each impact. He's still taking it and grinning at you, but he's also seemingly surprised by the ferocity of the strikes. Is that your turn? Are you going to move?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's it. No, I'm not going to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He's going to use one of his legendary actions to, at the end of your turn, reach out and attack you again. That's going to be a 23 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Instead of attacking, he's going to grapple you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So his claw goes up and actually (fwoosh) reaches into your throat, and you can feel the claws digging into the flesh. It's a very, very firm grip and he has you right where he wants you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Work that hand out a lot, do you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's that action there. All right, that brings us to the guards. The guards all reload their crossbow bolts, move in. These three now see the bear in the back and they're going to fire on Trinket. These seven are all going to fire on Grog, now that he's held there. So the three against Trinket. That's going to be a 16?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Doesn't hit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 22.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One actually sticks and Trinket, (growls) but it's not enough to really cause much of a worry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he doesn't care.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other seven against you, Grog. Natural 20. Natural one. That's not going to hit, that's a natural five. 18?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural one. That's a 19, that hits. A 19 naturally, so it's 27. One more. That's 18 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, these all have advantage on you because you did a reckless attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right, I did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the one that would have missed is a natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit. Natural 20 again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm rolling for all the ones that would have missed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do they have advantage on you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I had advantage on mine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Reckless attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's reckless!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) It is very reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all hit you, three of which are crits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sarcastically) Yay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First crit is 19 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (flatly) Merry Critmas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second crit is going to be nine points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last one is going to be another nine points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, 37 halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, that would be 15 total because that was a crit. So the three crits are out of the way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. 37. So, 15 total?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 on the last one, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And so those are the three crits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 33. What's half of 33?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, so that's that. And the next ones are 11. Another 11.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to have to thin these ranks out quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. And seven. So you take another 39 points of piercing damage after that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to use my stone's endurance to get rid of that stank.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll, plus my constitution. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say you used it on that one. That's 39 points of piercing damage, reduced by half. That will put you at 18.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 18? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say you take 18 points of piercing damage from those four non-crits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So yeah. That ends the guards' volley. That brings us to Vex. You're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me? And Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. And Trinket. Both.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so I run in after Percy and my brother.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Trinket--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to dash? Because you can move, you can double move, using your action to move, if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Unless you want to use your action to yell out for Trinket to attack, in which case, you can give Trinket a round of combat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I do want to give Trinket a round of combat, so yes.

lines.name: MATT
