lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he gets a couple of attacks if I don't attack at all, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's good. (screams) Okay, Trinket gets two attacks because of bestial fury.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He hears your voice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he hears my voice. So he's going to run around and he's going to try to knock over-- he's going to cannonball into the vampire guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so he's going to move this way and then cannonball forward?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (thudding footsteps) Gets a couple of running starts, and then rolls into a roly-poly style forward. All right, so make one attack against him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Okay. What do I add to that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your attack bonus for Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know, for your bear. AC, HP, bite attack, claw attack, plus eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, plus eight just for the attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 does not hit, unfortunately. So Trinket rolls past. He dodges out of the way, gets an attack of opportunity on him because he wasn't hit as part of the attack. That's a 27 to hit. Trinket takes seven plus three, ten points of slashing damage as he streaks by. Seeing the bear coming at him too soon and managing to both pull out of the way and use that to his advantage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be playing rule Nazi tonight. Is that attack of opportunity possible since he's grappling somebody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, yes. He's just grappling with one hand and just dodges out of the way, moves over and slashes with the other hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trying everything I can to save this bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket then comes out of cannonball and tries to bite the back of the vampire's neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'll let you do that because this is your full round to do that. Usually you would choose to cannonball--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or I do my two attacks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But because you aren't part of this combat fray and you're giving all of your round to him, I'll let you do it, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket comes out of the roll, turns around (roars) and strikes with the claw, swiping--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's trying to bite his neck like a vampire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, bite him? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit. Ooh! That's good. 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Split his head like a gourd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I see the smoke from the fire rising up from what Scanlan did on the other house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point? Make a perception check. It's a heavy storm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not great. 12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Currently, in the storm, you're just not able to really make up any visual in the distance right now, no. You do not know if there is any fire going on or any signal, at this point.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Shit. Are there any other windows along the back side of the house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here? Yeah, there's a window there, window there, window there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Through the side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, back here? This side, there are no other windows. It is completely closed off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No other windows?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, there's just the one entry there that everyone else went in through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit. Okay, I'll go inside.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello, is there anyone in here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there anything in this direction? This way? Can we not get this way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a storage closet that was already checked by Vax, who walked past it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we know if there are any outside doors over here on this side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't, no. No one's moved all the way in to see, and it's not very well-lit in there, currently.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could I have gone around the edge here to see? Would we have known, going on this side, if there were any doors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because you guys approached from that side. You saw windows, but it was fairly dark. You saw a little bit of light moving through some of the windows on the second story, but nothing down here that really caught your attention.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we still have no way into this main room, either, yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not yet. There is a door at the end of this hallway, but nobody's gotten to try it yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you get to a second-floor window?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could push past your party and continue to move down the hallway, if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Second floor's better than first floor, anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm sorry. I'm an asshole.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You turn into an asshole.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (giggling) I turn into an asshole. Were there any-- fuck, I really don't want to have to blow-- okay, so I'm going to---

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You came inside. Not going to retcon it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dick. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just saying! You can't get halfway in there and be like, "Wait, this didn't happen."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Technically, none of this happened.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for coming with me on that journey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fine, I'll just see if this fucking door is open. That's all I can do right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one across the way?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, guys, excuse me. Sorry, excuse me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two double doors across the way that lead into what you think is the foyer, in which Grog and Trinket currently stormed through. And you can hear, muffled through the door in the distance, the sound of combat and impact and people shouting to each other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, can I cross over to that window and look out the front window? The window over here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you can get that far, and you can just crest and look out the window if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see any fire from Scanlan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this point, you've already checked once. You're just getting in there. You won't be able to really see from here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to the top. Percy, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Can I call him? Can I, (whispering) "Scanlan. Scanlan!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear nothing back. You fear you might be just out of range for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a bitch. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to make a run for the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You can get to there. You're just at the edge of it. Do you want to try and knock it open?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it open? Can I open the door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try to. You reach out. (creak) It opens up and you can see now, a light comes pouring through from the foyer, and you can hear much louder now, the sound of combat, and Grog chuckling, and swings and impacts. You can see a couple of crossbow bolts go (boof) and scatter across the ground.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have to use my action to move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill things.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shoot out the window.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shoot out the window?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just act on the fly like Scanlan did. It turned out okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do your thing, Percy. Do your thing. What are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to be helpful. I'm going to burn my action to get into the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Where do you want to get on this side?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I want to stand right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you just swing around (fwwwt) to the inside. You look up and immediately you see this curved banister and a whole row of guards up top with heavy crossbows. In the center, you can see some blur as Grog, Trinket, and some individual are in the middle of this tussle. The individual currently has Grog grasped by the throat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How crazy-- I don't know if I can do Minor Illusion that way right now. So I'm going to call Hex on that first guard there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which one? Right there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burn my action surge, and I'm going to start taking my shots, and I'm just going to work my way up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you swing around the corner and look up at the one guard. As you concentrate for a second, bringing your gun up, your eyes begin to go black again, the smoke pouring out from the corner of it. Smoke begins to pour out of the midsection of the guard, who looks confused for a second, and it swirls around him as part of the Hex that has him marked, as you release your next three blasts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. This is with sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That sucks. Ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten misses. First shot just (ricochet noise) goes wide, blasting a chunk out of the upstairs hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 also goes wide. This time (ricochet noise) blasting part of the banister in front. The guard dodges out of the way as the wood splinters past him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's better!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the Percy we know. (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And so since that was a third shot, it was also a bonus shot, so that's got an extra-- okay! Does that mean that everything gets doubled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All dice gets doubled, and then you add the modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not the modifier, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not the modifier, no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Modifier stays the same.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll twice, or just double my die?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double the die. It's faster.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so that's-- I should have just used my--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What device?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know! I should have just used it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not bad, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine, 13, 26. 42 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 42 points of damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And four of that was fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I move the black cloud to the next guard. He also gains disadvantage on all-- let's make it dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ability checks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ability checks, yeah, so all dex checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the smoke (whoosh) pours off the body and coalesces around the next guard to his right. All right, that ends your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I've got double speed. I go right towards the table, make an acrobatics check to slide my ass across it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you doing what I did?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do an acrobatics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! Dukes of Hazzard!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That is a 23?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You (shhht) slide to there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did it so much cooler than me! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to slide into a crouch right behind-- I don't want to go that far. Right by Percy, because I can't go much further, I don't think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At double movement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would I be able to make it to Grog and his friend? If I can't make it to Grog, I want to stay at the door. If I can make it to Grog, I want to go to Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slide will give you movement. Yeah, you can get next to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't want to go next to him, I want to go and eviscerate the bowels of the fucker who's fucking with him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so right there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, you can get up there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sneak attack because he's engaged with Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So here comes the total.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As he slides over the table in front of me, I go, "That was pretty awesome. Bye. Good luck."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You need some daggers?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: More daggers!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait. So. I'm alive! Rogue rules--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatcha doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use luck on that first attack and go again-- ooh, and I'll use the first one. So the first one was an 8 plus... 19 on the first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Second is a 19?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Third is 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sneak attack on the first one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the keen dagger, that's a ten. And the third attack is the Flametongue again for seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. Okay, gotcha. So you (fwoosh) dart in a blur of darkness. You come swinging up. You can see Tylieri is currently grasping Grog. Out of the corner of his eye, just sees the movement and looks over curiously as the blade is immediately in his side. (pained scream) And now you can see the jowls shake from the impact of the dagger blow, and he looks down angrily at you, fangs bared as the two other attacks hit his side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm looking him right in the eye as I do that, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn, he uses two of his legendary actions--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm wearing my helmet, my shiny helmet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. To look at you, reach up with the throat that he's grasped, and sink his fangs directly into your throat, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (angry noise) I have a little collar. Does that help at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Very big neck, and a very tiny collar. (laughs) That will be a 20 to hit?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So you take nine points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that halved?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is halved. Yeah. So say five, round up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you do take 14 points of necrotic damage. That is not reduced. But your maximum hit points are now reduced by 14.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you feel that same similar cold feeling as the life blood's being drained out of your body and you see his eyes cresting at you with this wild glare. That ends your turn, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is now his turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Spider-man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, now he's taking his turn. He's now going to go ahead and make another bite attack on you again. As he pulls back and reaches his forearm and grabs the other side of your throat, going for the other side of the jugular.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Isn't this a Grog buffet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, because you've got your necklace on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, he does have advantage on you because you used your reckless strike.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Never use reckless strike again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doesn't it cancel out after one roll? Advantage versus disadvantage is one roll, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It ended on the first attack, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a one on the first attack, yeah. It's until your next turn. Attacks against you get advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I thought his first bite was the first one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, so all attacks, even follow-up attacks get advantage, even though he only gets advantage on the first one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll read it for you right now. It's a cool ability when you're not the only tank in the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it is not! It's the worst ability ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a good ability if you're only fighting one person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, but attack rolls against you have advantage until your next turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because he's out of it. He's going cuckoo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, did you not have-- Jesus, never use that thing again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doing so gives you advantage on melee weapon attack rolls using strength during this turn. So yes, I apologize. It does give you advantage on all of your attacks. I misread that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (quietly) Oh, shitfuck. (louder) That's okay. That's okay!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stuff happens. Give him a bonus 15 HP or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. Yeah, it's fine. But going forward, good to know. So it does give you advantage on all of your attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Copy that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So he goes in to strike for the bite. This time, however, he does manage to catch the chainmail coif that Scanlan had made you. His fangs get caught on the chain. (grunts)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like making out with braces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He pulls away, releases you-- no, doesn't release you. As he's holding you there, he's going to go ahead and make a claw strike across your face. Two and, oh. That'll be a 19.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does hit? Okay. You take eight points of slashing damage, reduced to four because of your rage. That ends his turn. Grog, you're up now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Am I still grappled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still grappled, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to try and break the grapple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you use your action to try and break the grapple. So athletics roll of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you (boof) just shove him off without a problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have your bonus action to strike, if you like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action to try and grapple him back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not as a bonus action, unfortunately. It's an action to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will attack, yeah. Just one, right? (whoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One strike, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Fuck yes! 21?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 does hit, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 22 with the fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 damage. All right. (whack) And you're watching, as he does all these actions, you see his body begin to reform and the wounds beginning to heal themselves in the vampiric manner. But as soon as that wound begins to sew up, you take your hammer and (boof) slam it into him again, reopening, and you can see now parts of his muscles are exposed, a deep purplish color, this very unnatural interior to his flesh. You can see it burn as the flames cauterize the edges of the wound. Awesome. Does that finish your turn? Do you want to move at all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm staying. Is Trinket still behind me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is currently flanking the guy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no. I'll stay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all reload their crossbows. These four are now going to make shots at you, Percy. These three are going to take shots-- all five of these guys are going to take shots at Grog now. They're trying to take you down so they can move onto the next target. So four shots on you, Percy. That is 20?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 11.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does not hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you take from three heavy crossbow bolts at you. Seven, 19, 32 points of piercing damage. All three bolts stick into your chest. They're big, long, thick, heavy crossbow bolts. One of them gleans off your shoulder and catches the edge of the wall, but the other two have actually sunk into your torso and are sticking out of you. The other five against you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since you did not do reckless strike last time, they are not with advantage. That is 19?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's a 25.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 19?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last one is a 24.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, so four out of the five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. That's 11 plus seven. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus eight. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus 13. So 39.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 39. Half.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! Can I get up to the doorway? Tell me that I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a dash, you can, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I don't get any action, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Janet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it, Janet! All right, Trinket's just going to try to claw him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead. Two attacks from Trinket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make it good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, you're my favorite bear, Trinkie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That hits him. That definitely hits him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 16 plus a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah, that hits him.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: A natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Trinket got a natural 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so damage on the first strike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was a critical "rawrl."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 11 for the first, and then--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So sour it was sweet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three plus seven is ten. 20? Which part doubles?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the dice doubles?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dice doubles, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 13 for the second attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So a total of 23 damage? All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 24 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 damage. How does Trinket want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He really just killed a vampire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this a first?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's Trinket's first kill.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trinket!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket claws crosswise and takes off his head with a bite.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as Trinket reaches down, (whoosh) arcing both claws across his back, Tylieri is dropped to his hands and knees, looks up as Trinket then puts his jaws down over the head and lifts up. As you see the flesh begin to tear on his body, he screams out in pain as the body (fluttering sound) turns to mist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it! He's a vampire!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, is the mist there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The mist is there, yeah. There's a clump of mist where he once was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somebody light a match!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm coming!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So the head disappears from his mouth, or did he still get a big taste?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings us to Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay! So seeing Vax go over the table and being like, "That was cool," I'm also going to be like (grunts) over the table. I'm going to join the Dukes of Hazzard train.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Acrobatics check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn it. That's not bad!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a huge difficulty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Acrobatics? 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17, yeah. You jump up (shh) slide across, land across. The bonus there is that it takes only one block of movement to get across. That's five foot there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I'm going to come in and I see a headless dude with mist swirling around him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you just see Grog, Vax, and Trinket in the center of this foyer, with a big cloud of mist near Trinket and Grog, and an entire array of guards with heavy crossbows trained down on the three of them in this ambush pit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would she know what it was?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you would! We've learned about vampires. We know they turn into mist.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, the vampires down by the tree did this. They misted in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sunlight that shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sunbeam!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Someone could yell at me to do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (shouts) Sunlight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say... make an intelligence check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. This one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's the intelligent dice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, it is. Just with my modifier?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, is this a saving throw? Just my modifier, so 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17. Okay. I'd say, given the circumstance right now, just rushing in and seeing mist there and people with things, you have no idea that's a vampire, you have no reason to believe that's a vampire, you just know that right now there is-- I'm just being honest here! You walk in the room and there's a little bit of mist on the ground and there's a bunch of guards up there. It looks like there's a threat of a bunch of guards in the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Identify it. It's a vampire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know it now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Grog, in the middle of a frenzied rage, would not have that--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would have enough to point and say-- oh, for the love of god. Okay, fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, take your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No more metagaming. Take your turn. What do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I know what I want to do, but I can't do it without feeling guilty! I was going to Sunbeam this bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It only makes sense. I'm just saying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What makes sense? That I wouldn't know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That you wouldn't know that that little bit of mist on the ground there is a vampire. There's no way that Keyleth would know that based on the way you--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just missed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you just missed it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would just see a black mist?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's just a mist.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got a ton of other people in the room, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there's black smoke around one of the guards up there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, if I saw a black mist, what I would probably do, realistically, is think it was some sort of poison shit and I would Wind Wall it. So I'm going to (goosh) Wind Wall that mist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All righty. Let's see. (laughs) This should actually be pretty interesting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (weakly) It's what I would assume it was, but I might be aiding it in getting away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is bullshit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, this Wind Wall is now currently held up in this area. That's your action.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I Wind Wall it to keep, essentially do the Wind Wall--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, around Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right at this area?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'd want to protect him from the crossbows.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So there's just wind rushing up around. You can see the tapestries on the walls are flickering around.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then I once again go, "Scanlan! Scanlan!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point in time right now, you're--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm on the roof?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're hearing crackling in your ear, but you're still on the roof doing the chaos, so you haven't heard anything really coming through, at this point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Doing the chaos."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to stay right there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm doing this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're trust-falling off the roof.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to back into the corner and keep this Wind Wall up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us up to Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I take my next shot at the next crossbow bugger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Just misses.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: God damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hits the armor and it (ricochet noise) ricochets off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So am I encapsulating the mist in my Wind Wall? I'm kind of trapping the mist in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Wind Wall itself is not a full circle, it's just a semi-circle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A half-circle, yeah, but is it stuck in the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's currently overlapped with it, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 to hit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It hit. That's 18 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. And you have your third attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My third attack, also on him, is also 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And that's-- ooh, that sucks. Two points of ice damage plus 11 points of normal damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 total. Okay. So (doosh) the last two blasts hit him, and you can see, he almost gets thrown off his feet from the impact. There's now blood trickling out from under his helmet from where one of the blasts got his chin. One into his chest. He's still standing up, barely, and he's still confused by this smoke that's swirling around him. Are you going to stay where you are?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a step forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Up the stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up the stairs. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just ominously stepping up the stairway. I like it. That brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, so I'm going to start rushing up the stairs. Before I do, I'm going to spank Grog as hard as I can on the ass and say, "Kill!" And run up the stairs at the first guy who's enveloped in Percy's smoke and start stabbing him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He's up above the banister, so you probably have to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no balcony?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the idea is the banister rides up and there's a wall along it, and then they're all up on the second floor here looking down at this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So there's no way up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could leap up. Make an acrobatics check to leap up and over the banister.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you jump, grab it, flip over, land on the balcony next to the guy enveloped in smoke.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I stab him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Did the leaping take any of my actions? It's movement?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's part of your movement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so that's 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And a 16. And a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First two hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay. The first one is the Flametongue dagger. That is four plus six is ten. And the second one is the keen dagger, and that is two plus seven is nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (stabbing sounds) As the first two daggers stab in, the second one actually finds between his ribs up to where his heart is, and you see him gasp for a second as he crumples beneath your grip, and you slide the blade out as he crumples to the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the button.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Tylieri--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, he's still alive?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's a mist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, the mist pushes past. He's going to use some action to move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He pushes past the Wind Wall? But it says that figures caught in a gaseous form can't pass through the Wind Wall. In the spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That it does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just read it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my motherfucking Wind Wall!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it's going to screw up my arrows, so I was checking in. But yeah, it also says, "creatures in gaseous form can't pass through it."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would they even have a hypothetical for that?

lines.name: LIAM, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Because of this!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because of the things right here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's coming in handy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, Mike Mearls!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, as part of that, then Trinket is also in the Wind Wall, as well, just as a note. So Trinket will be taking bludgeoning damage for being within it. So just as a heads-up. In fact, right now, have Trinket make a strength saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it like a hurricane or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a wall of wind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Eight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Trinket takes 3d8 bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll 3d8.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 3d8. Up to 24.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I thought you were capturing him inside. I didn't realize you had it actually on him, and so having the Wind Wall on him to prevent him from moving would also have Trinket in it, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could be worse. That's six plus four, so ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's had worse. He'll be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tylieri stays there in mist form, being caught in the whirlwind. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I can't get through the-- I mean, I don't know what the fuck--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can get through the Wind Wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What am I going to do to gas? Hit it? Can I start running up the motherfucking stairs and jump up like Vax did? He said to kill!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, yeah. You can get up to there, and you're just within reach to get one guy over the banister, probably.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! I'd like to do that. That's a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. More attacks?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Oh, how many attacks do I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of them. That was just your movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yay, I get all of them?! That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your barbarian 40 feet of crazy movement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yay! 22!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit! 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) The first two hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 13. 17 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, 17 damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 15, and 17 again. Two plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. All right, so (whack) the hammer comes streaking down, slamming into the guard there. His crossbow shatters from the impact and the flames begin to lick up the front of his body. The second slam smacks him again. This time, you hear the armor ring out from the metal-on-metal impact. He kind of shakes from it. The third time you're just in the middle of this series of swinging and he backs up, and you end up smashing the banister instead of him, the hammer cracking part of the ground on the second floor. He looks pretty messed up from that series of attacks. All right, that ends your turn, Grog. It's now the guards' turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come at me, bro.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They pull out their longswords. This one's going to turn with his crossbow and fire at you, Vax. So first is the attack at you with the crossbow. That is a 20?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're like, (groans) that's going to suck. You feel the scraping of the bone as it impacts. The two with the longswords against you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 18?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 12.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of the blades come at you. One of them actually hits your shoulder, but it just sticks an inch into the flesh, and you just flex and the blade pops out. The second one swings out and you duck your head out of the way and it (whoosh) goes long and you just grin through the anger. That's awesome. Then these two are going to fire crossbows at you, Grog. That is going to be a 15?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Misses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a 23.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn, I was almost Neo, just dodging all sorts of shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another ten. 13 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Halved to seven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half that to seven, yeah. And then now the three aiming at Trinket. They all have disadvantage, I believe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing can shoot through the Wind Wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing can shoot through it at all?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Arrows can't go through it, it said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At all?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She said begrudgingly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which fucking sucks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I mean, it's going to save a bear, right? After I punched him with the wind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, and also kill the bear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they automatically miss. They all three fire through. All bolts just (shhh) get scattered across the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it goes straight up to the roof, it says.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wind Wall. That's awesome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does the Wind Wall go all the way up to the ceiling, or does it go to a certain height?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 15 foot high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends their turn. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to tell Trinket to get out of the Wind Wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he's going to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes to the front door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he's going to be very happy to see me come around the corner of that door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where I will see a bunch of dudes up high, and I want to try to do Conjure Barrage up and over the Wind Wall and in an arc downward on everybody on the other side of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a (whoo, boom).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A half-pull.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, which at this short distance, is not a lot of strength to get the lob.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a really skilled archer. I'm kind of like Legolas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But if you're shooting up this way? The Wind Wall itself only really encompasses the bottom of the foyer, so if you go up the stairs a little bit, you will be able to get these guys here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get up there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah! Fuck yeah, I'll do it and try to get everybody in that cone. Sorry, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope. Make it rain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're going to hit all of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just go for it. I'm a fan of one-dollar bills.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can take it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just throw it in the air and it turns into a cone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I don't have to attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They should have a saving throw, I believe, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they have a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone make a dexterity saving throw. Or at least you two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have advantage-- I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm casting this as a 3rd-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One guy makes the saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all succeed. One of the villains makes it, and they both make it. Is it half-damage, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about all those guys up at the top?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's what I'm saying. This guy made it, these two didn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the other ones?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you doing it from this perspective? These will go through the Wind Wall, so the Wind Wall itself will prevent it from getting to either. This guy will probably be hit, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He fails. So yeah, these guys are unaffected because the Wind Wall prevents the barrage from that point. So just go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I can't get a critical hit on this because I don't have to roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 16, am I right? 16. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so it's half that for saves, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so eight damage, four damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, uncanny dodge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Half that. So what did you give me for damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You had eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight? That's four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then as a bonus action, I'm going to Hunter's Mark. Who looks the strongest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one dude over here that appears to be commanding them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I want to hit him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The last bit of health that he had.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You took away my playmate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, that's the end of your turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. So I'm going to keep maintaining this Wind Wall and wrap it up around the mist to double-enforce it, and I'm going to scream, "What is this?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and then what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "It's a vampire!" I'm putting my gun away, anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that count?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a vampire. We just killed him. Sort of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Be warned: treading thin ice with metagaming with your DM going forward, but yes. You have now heard it from Percy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not metagaming! I'm legitimately asking whether this counts!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You heard Percy say, "Vampire!"

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: Vampire!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (weakly) Oh! Great!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's that charisma score, again? Where is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we fade to black.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Drop your fucking Wind Wall so I can hit something!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll drop the Wind Wall and cast Sunbeam and, eyes flashing, light just (goom), right in the concentrated beam where I have this mist there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And stuff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, that will be considered direct sunlight. As you release the Wind Wall, the mist immediately begins to push its way this way out of the room. However, you catch it, your eyes glow, and as you release your hand forward, a blast of pure sun energy shoots forth from your hands. You see it burning the back wall like a big, thick laser, and as the mist tries to escape, you catch up to it, and you hear this faint, echoing, screeching cry as the mist immediately is evaporated on impact. (explosion noise)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we loot the mist?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) "Can we loot the mist?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can fill a pocket with ash, if you like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, at least some coins falling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (ding ding ding) Like Scott Pilgrim? Oh, look! Coins. (laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, can you use your bonus action to wink at Matt to ask for forgiveness?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why do

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can use my bonus action to heal somebody, if someone wants it. Actually, how about this? I used my bonus action to ask what the shit was this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does that make you feel better?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's the damage on my rapier, again? Was it 1d10 plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 1d8. It's a plus-one rapier, so it's 1d8 plus your dexterity modifier, plus one, so it would be plus seven for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Then in that case, I'm going to bring my Hex up to the very next--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to put my gun away, walk up to him, and begin stabbing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. One, two, three, four, five. At that height you're going to have to leap up onto the second floor to get to him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so go ahead and make an acrobatics check, if you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to walk up, not quite that close, but one step back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take my next three shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Walk up the stairs. Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to stop there in case that kills him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I had to reload anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So there you go. So your third attack is to reload.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All three was reload, attack, attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So that's 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. All righty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (gunshot) He is blasted out of place. You can see there's a gaping hole across where one of his lungs was located, and he (groans) crumples to the ground into a pile.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I move the mist to the next guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You use a bonus action to re-curse him, by the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had a bonus action, so I just used it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, you do. Technically, you used the bonus action this turn to put it onto him from the last turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did I? You're technically correct, so go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're probably going to do it on your next turn, anyway, so we'll just leave it there. It's fine. But keep that in mind, as this is a new ability.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sneezes)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gesundheit.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Bless you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that fellow who's enveloped in schmutz right next to Grog?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your answer for everything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one is not that great. It's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 misses.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one is a 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are flanking him, though. You have advantage on the attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, well let's do that again, then. We'll call that a 27 instead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then the second one is now a 20, and the third one is a 26. (shunk, shunk, shunk) Two plus seven is nine for the keen dagger, and then for the life-stealing dagger is a seven, and then back to the keen dagger, that is an 11.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you get sneak attack damage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, right. Yeah, I'll put that in. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was like, "Where's that? That's the whole point of this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All those?! Holy crap.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight, nine, ten, 11, 17, 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (explosion noise)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, no, Grog!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, you killed Grog!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the daggers cut through his midsection, and you see where the armor plating itself was exposed from the first strike. The last one you just jam up into his torso, taking out any major organs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would also like to boot him over the side as I do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (groans) He falls over (thudding) down the stairs, past you, Percy. You let him tumble by as he slides to a stop at the very bottom of the stairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I put my foot on him to stop him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This once-nice, fine wood is now completely coated in crimson. (laughs) Okay. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it me? (stuttering) Is it just a row of guys in front of me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to hold my turn. Because if I stand in front of them, nobody can do anything to them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's nice of you. You could just go (whoosh) and cross them off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many's left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are five nervous-looking guards right now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were trying to haul ass out?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nah, I'll hold. Whoever's next can go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So polite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is really kind of you, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. It is now the guards' turn. They all...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Run away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're going to try and flee, aren't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look to each other, and their one leader goes like, "Men, run!" They all rush and leap off the balcony, try and catch themselves there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See those acrobatics checks...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want them all to fall, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Eat it. Make them all eat it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Three of them land fine and begin bolting forward. Two of them fall. One of them (cracking noise) breaks his ankle and falls to the ground going (scream). The other one slams into his hip on the ground and falls prone. These guys are prone. These three continue to move forward to there. They're going for a full dash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does Trinket get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against one of them. He can only take one reaction per turn. They all rush out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That definitely hits him, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket reaches out and strikes across one of the guys, the guy you Hunter's Marked, who takes the claw across the side of his head, and you hear him yell out in pain, (scream) as he makes it out into the rain. Hurt, but not taken down. He continues to run past, and they all dart outside into the rainstorm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take my turn now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I leap over the banister with my war hammer high and jump down on the guy that's closest to me, bringing it down with a reckless attack and great weapon master.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make an athletics check for the jump.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, don't fall on your ass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, that's true. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll give you advantage on this because you're raging and it's reckless and it's just funnier.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: That's better!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24, yeah. You leap in the air (whoosh) like slow-motion (whoosh, explosion) down on top. Go ahead and roll three attacks on him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Amazing, that's 27. That's 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage on those.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, not a problem. Ten, 19, 29 on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 29 on the first one? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) And 28 on the second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you come down, the hammer blow slams into his torso, his actual metal armor crinks inward, and he goes, (screams) gasping in pain, as you've now jammed his own ribs into his internal organs. As you pull the hammer up with a sludgy, sucking sound you see him look at you with this look of, "No!" and the hammer comes down again. This time on top of his head, which, Gallagher watermelon, just (boosh) across the floor of this. Done, you look over at his friend, who is like, (gasps) trying to back up with his broken ankle. With your third attack, he's within your range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (inarticulate war cry)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I don't need it. That's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll advantage just in case it's a critical.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's the same thing. It's 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, there you go. That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. I haven't critted in forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Even if you don't need the advantage, it's nice to roll a second time in case because there's a chance of a natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's 20, 30.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30 points of damage on him. (whack) This one you actually bring down onto his other leg. That leg snaps.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he on his back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's on his back and he's trying to pull away from you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right on the knee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right on the knee? (crack) It snaps underneath and he screams out in pain as the hammer pulls back. You can see where the bone is jutting out. You've actually taken off the lower half of his leg from the sheer bludgeoning force, and he's now bleeding out onto the ground a little bit. Not as much as he would be, because the flame cauterized the impact from the hammer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (pained) So detailed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is in a really, really bad place. All righty. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'm going to-- should I shoot at the guys running away?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Are they close by?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're just out the front of the doors.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to come down and get in range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're supposed to advertise!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (giggles) Timing is everything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to lightning arrow because everything within ten feet is affected.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that would hit all three. All right, you pull out your arrow. You aim it close. You can see the rain pouring down and they're all running out into the storm. You're like, "Storm, that's interesting." And you release.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 27? No, that's a lie. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against the guy you've Hunter's Marked?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then get the rest of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they have to make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This guy fails. What's the DC on it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should be at the top of your spell sheet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Okay, second guy fails. Guy who's Hunter's Marked does succeed, so he takes half damage on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm hitting him initially, so he takes 2d8. They all take 2d8. 17, 19, plus Hunter's Mark on the first guy. They all take 19, and then the extra guy takes an extra five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The guy that Trinket swiped just screams (pained scream) as you can see the electricity charging through him, and the wet rain that hit him has caused it to even give more--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought Trinket swiped the Hunter's Marked guy, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did he?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I remember you saying that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then I'll give you that. So the guy who is Hunter's Marked ends up destroyed, the electricity bouncing through his armor. He goes, (moan) and falls to the ground and crumples over. The other two guys get jolted and almost knocked off their feet. They're both looking really, really rough, and they both look at each other (panting) and just keep running with what little strength they have left. You still have a second attack, don't you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Oh, gosh. I'm going to shoot--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to shoot people in the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm not going to shoot them in the back. The guy on the ground, he looks like he's in a lot of pain, doesn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, he's not going anywhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put him out of his misery.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We don't want people running to report we're here, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, really? So I should get the guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get them, yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No witnesses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They might be vampires.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They might

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I can't lightning arrow them again, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's a bonus action to cast it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'll just regular old attack and I can only get one of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I yell out from the top, "Vex, no survivors!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, all right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (zoomf) Next arrow nocked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a 19 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of damage. (zoomf) That guy is, through the back of the head, (zoomf, groan) and just slides through the mud for another two feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I act like I have another, that I can attack him again. I say, "Stop!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: LIAM, SAM
lines.text: Come on, girl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20! (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It is. It is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Watching his friend fall and slide in the mud, he stops where he stands and looks over his shoulder, slowly turning around, shaking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I say, "Get inside now."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Next up is Keyleth. Are you going to do anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I kill him or do we keep him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have to make that decision yourself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he coming back inside?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's standing there now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's currently standing about ten feet outside in the rain, just (shaky breathing).

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that a window I'm up against, behind me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no. There is no window to the front here. It's just a wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just going to go, "Excuse me. Excuse me, Trinket. Sorry." And I'm going to peek around the door and go (shkoof) and Sunbeam him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to Sunbeam?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That guy. That scared-shitless guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) Okay. What level is Sunbeam?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's what I just did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level is Sunbeam?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many 6th-level spells per day can you cast?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a concentration spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right! You can do it for up to a minute. Good call.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a concentration spell. I can keep doing it for a minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so freaking cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's pretty dope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can do that, too? I didn't know that. Well, not that spell, but with anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) No. Do damage. 12.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 16. That's 23 plus... 30 damage. Radiant damage. (lightning noise)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he's standing in the rain, shaking, and looking at his friend, and looking at you, Keyleth steps into frame and goes, (boom). And before he can go, "Wait!" and there's just this scattering of ash that was once was his body. His armor is left intact and just tumbles to the ground in this pile. You see smoke sizzling off the now-heated armor. There's no sign of his physical body anymore, just a smattering of mud that the ash has now mixed with in the rain outside. Melt with prejudice, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got one guy left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now as you guys are all gathering around, we'll say from a roleplaying standpoint, as there is no real immediate threat to you; there is one guard left, who has currently one broken ankle and one missing lower half of his left leg, on the ground, looking at you all, hyperventilating and trying to back away, like (panting).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Time to call the Sandman.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Since I'm outside on the threshold of the house, can I see where Scanlan might have lit up the other house yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rainstorm does make it a little hard to see, at this point, and through the adrenaline pumping in your system, and the fact that you just disintegrated two individuals in a short period of time. You're also wrestling with the morality of that and dealing with what you just did, so your concentration doesn't enable you to notice anything yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's got questions for Peg-Leg over here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do. I hop down off the balcony and walk up by Grog.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start exploring the upstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I stay standing outside just staring out into the distance, waiting for Scanlan's cue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I know. Which is what we were technically supposed to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we said we were waiting 30 seconds and then going in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was a terrible plan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Greatest plan we've ever had. You were amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? You were amazing, we killed them, it was great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hold my hammer over his other knee and I go, "Look, we can work on you one limb at a time, "or you can be very truthful and my friend can end it all very, very quickly."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (panting) "What do you want?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no question, this is a bad situation you're in right now. We're not looking for you at all. I'm happy to knock you out and leave you in a closet here and lock it. If you want to help me find the Briarwoods, I really want to know where the Briarwoods are. Not you. Just the people you work for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks around at the rest of the group, sees you walk up the stairs. (panting) "They're in "the bloody castle, where else would they be?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In? Or under?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a good question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I don't know. They spend equal parts in both, as far as I know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I peek around my brother and go, "Isn't there anyone else in the house?"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you're lying, you'll pay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All of us who were here, we were waiting for you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "Got it." I go upstairs with Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That mist is probably following me around at this point, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The black smoke, you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah. The black smoke is slowly trailing behind you. With each step you take, it licks the back of your boots.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, boy. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything else you can tell me in regards to back doors or secrets that your bosses don't want us to know? I mean, really, this is the time to talk, right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything you use to identify each other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage because he has--

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: One leg?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's bleeding out right now. Wait, no, he's not bleeding out. He's bleeding, but it's a trickle because of the cauterization.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nothing should have survived that ambush."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's back this up a little bit. You hung people from the Sun Tree?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, as a warning."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Where I saw that child?" I slit his throat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (extended choking sounds) With a wet gurgle, the life expires from his body, a pool beginning to form on the tile below him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nicely done, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Piece of shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So Percy and I are upstairs alone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I check his body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) You begin rummaging through the body. You're keeping an eye out. Make another perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go upstairs, and I get Percy up against a wall. I turn around and slam him against a wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is sexy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I look him straight in the eye--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And kiss him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I say, "Are you all right?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look me in the eye, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel cruel, but in control. This is controllable, at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "All right." I'm insight-checking him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll insight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit, just shit. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your charisma modifier?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My charisma modifier is two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He's hard to read right now. His focus is divided amongst your intensity and trying to answer your question. The pause in his throat isn't because he's thinking, it's because he grasps the words to describe it, but there is a quiver to it, and you can see his hands are still shaking a little bit. And as you look down at his hands, you can also see the smoke is still slowly swirling his ankle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You'll know if I'm not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I follow behind him closely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's keep looking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You start seeing, now, the dark plume of smoke in the distance. Scanlan has apparently and effectively set the signal. You also do notice, as you're looking out, other people have left their homes now--
